name: StudyAP
tagline: AI-powered study platform for AP students
description: Comprehensive study platform with AI-generated practice questions, spaced repetition, and progress tracking for AP exam preparation.
highlights: Grew to 5,000+ active students across 12 AP subjects
Generated 50K+ AI practice questions with 94% accuracy rating
Built adaptive learning algorithm improving retention by 37%
Implemented OAuth and payment integration with Stripe
Optimized database queries reducing load time by 65%

name: LightAid
description: Real-time platform connecting disaster victims with relief organizations, featuring location-based matching and resource tracking.
highlights: Won 1st place at DECA Internationals 2023
Real-time geolocation matching using Google Maps API
Built admin dashboard for 15+ relief organizations
Implemented SMS notifications via Twilio integration
Designed mobile-first UI tested with 50+ users

name: FRC Scouting System
description: Competition scouting app for FIRST Robotics team to track match data, analyze opponent strategies, and optimize alliance selections.
highlights: Collected data on 60+ teams across 8 competitions
Built predictive model with 78% match outcome accuracy
Real-time data sync across 6 scout tablets
Generated automated match strategy reports
Contributed to team's qualification for World Championship

name: M&TSI Predictive Model
tagline: ML model for urban traffic optimization
description: Machine learning project predicting traffic congestion patterns to optimize signal timing in urban intersections.
highlights: Trained on 2.3M data points from city traffic sensors
Achieved 91% prediction accuracy using ensemble methods
Reduced model inference time by 43% through optimization

name: Nano-Grinding Research
description: Computational tool analyzing nano-scale grinding parameters to optimize surface finish quality in semiconductor manufacturing.
highlights: Analyzed 15K+ grinding simulations across 8 parameter dimensions
Identified optimal parameter ranges improving finish quality by 28%
Developed visualization dashboard for multi-objective optimization
Co-authored paper submitted to ASME Manufacturing Conference
Reduced experimental trial time by 60% through simulation

name: Personal Portfolio v1
description: Immersive 3D portfolio featuring interactive models, shader effects, and smooth animations to showcase projects.
highlights: Built custom 3D scene with 6 interactive project exhibits
Implemented GLSL shaders for realistic lighting and materials
